Khonkolor::

The lion Mountains avoided the shots jumping from side to side.

"STRIKE ONE!!!! STRIKE TWO!!!!... STRIKE THREEEE!!!" scremaed happily 
the young bot while he was avoiding the shots, he had something in 
his hand "AND YOU'RE... OUT!!!!"


He trow a mega-granade towards Wildrider and Dead-end.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> As soon as Wildrider lands from his successful hit, he starts 
moving again
> dodging most of the shots, a few bounce on to his armor. He speeds 
away to
> find a new target, perfect, he skids to a stop and transforms, 
beside
> Dead-End. "You okay buddy" he says in an accusing tone. He then 
turns to
> Khonkolor and fires his Scattershot laser gun. Ripping the air with 
16
> laser beams.
